title: picture thumbnails in a grid layout
body:
thanks for implementing preview icons in the latest github version (and all other hard work you are doing).
but that's not enough for photo gallery sharing using a public link (you can't see the pictures properly as it's too small).
proper image gallery sharing is feature #1 for me, the only reason why i can't fully switch to owncloud!

it would be cool to have two modes of showing directory contents:
- list (what we have now)
- grid of bigger icons (150x150 is enough, like in finder or windows explorer)

i tried to implement it by creating "apps/files/templates/part.icons.php" and modifying "apps/files/templates/index.php" but there are two problems:
1. lightbox seems to be hard-codded for table tr/td elements and requires 'a class="name"' element. i was not able to find the proper place which adds click js hook for showing that lightbox with other elements than tr/td. update: it's in apps/gallery/js/slideshow.js.
2. parts.list.php contains an url to icon with size parameters specified so i had to do a dirty hack like this which is awful:
$file['icon'] = str_replace("x=36&y=36", "x=150&y=150&scalingup=0", $file['icon']);

seems like the icon preview system is not implemented very well as it assumes all icons to be fixed-size 36x36. first - some people may like different icon sizes, second - why not to make it more generic and use it not only for icons but also for thumbnails of any size...

and pleeeease, make automatic slideshow starting configurable. i would like it not to play automatically but only after pressing the play icon in the bottom right.

you can see my dirty implementation running here https://zephyr.k3a.me/oc/public.php?service=files&t=f99e047b1beccb52ba0664a483aef281&icons
